slides.title: ContractScan
slides.subtitle: Turnkey app to scan SharePoint contract folders and detect applicable repricing actions

cards.label: Decision per action
cards.note: Designed to be conservative when evidence is weak

slides.title: What ContractScan Is
bullets: Web app that scans a SharePoint contract folder (MSA + exhibits + amendments, etc.)
Downloads documents via Microsoft Graph using a service principal (client credentials)
Extracts and chunks text, stores embeddings in ChromaDB for retrieval
Evaluates each action with RAG + LLM (Azure OpenAI / OpenAI / Groq)
Stores jobs and results in Postgres; UI + OpenAPI docs included

cards.label: Frontend
cards.note:
UI for action sets, scans, results
http://localhost:5173

cards.label: Worker
cards.note:
Runs scan pipeline
Uses Redis as broker

slides.title: Install & Start (recommended: Docker)
bullets: Prereqs: Docker Engine/Desktop + Docker Compose
Copy env: `cp .env.example .env`
Fill in keys/creds in `.env` (LLM provider + SharePoint Graph credentials)
Start the stack: `docker compose up --build`
Open UI: http://localhost:5173 • API docs: http://localhost:8000/docs

slides.title: Run Locally (no Docker, optional)
bullets: Start Postgres + Redis only: `docker compose up -d db redis`
Backend: `cd backend && uvicorn app.main:app --reload`
Worker: `celery -A app.tasks.celery_app worker --loglevel=INFO --concurrency=2`
Frontend: `cd frontend && npm i && npm run dev`
Tip: use a `.env.wsl` file for local DATABASE_URL/REDIS_URL overrides

slides.title: Operational Notes / Tuning
bullets: SharePoint scan resolves a shared folder URL via Graph `/shares/{shareId}/driveItem`
Supported inputs include PDF/DOCX (UI) and XLSX/TXT (pipeline); max size/limits configurable
Expect “Unclear” when evidence is insufficient; the tool is intentionally conservative
Tune retrieval and chunking via `.env`: RETRIEVER_TOP_K, CHUNK_SIZE, CHUNK_OVERLAP
Persistence: Postgres + Chroma live in Docker volumes (Chroma defaults to /data/chroma)
